report_warning: You are about to report this listing.
report_confirm: Are you sure this listing violates the rules of our application?
notif_deleted: Your listing has been removed because it did not comply with our terms of use
notif_favorited: added your item to their favorites
notif_review_left: ... left a review on your profile
review_comment_placeholder: Comment Describe your experience with this seller (optional)
settings_sale_my_item: Sale of one of my items
settings_sale_favorite_item: Sale of an item I had in favorites
settings_deleted_by_report: Deletion of one of my items due to reports or AI moderation
settings_added_favorite: One of my items was added to favorites by another user
settings_privacy_text1: We give special importance to protecting your personal data. The information you share in the app is used solely to ensure the proper functioning of the services and to improve your experience.
settings_privacy_text2: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.
settings_privacy_text3: You can view, modify, or delete your information at any time from your account settings.
settings_privacy_text4: For any questions regarding privacy or data processing, you can contact our user support.
settings_support_text1: Having an issue or a question about the app?
settings_support_text2: Check our help section for quick answers about app features, account management, or privacy settings.
settings_support_text3: If you need personalized assistance, you can write to us at:
settings_support_text4: We do our best to respond as quickly as possible.
about_story_1: Bonne Graine was created by three gardening enthusiasts who dreamed of making seed trading simpler, more accessible, and above all more community-driven.
about_story_2: Facing difficulties exchanging seeds reliably, sociably, and in an organized way, we designed an app that brings together a community around sharing, discovery, and biodiversity.
about_story_3: Our vision is to create a space where everyone can find, exchange, and pass on new varieties without excessive cost or constraints, and always in a spirit of mutual aid.
about_story_4: Day after day, we strive to improve the experience, propose new features, and encourage responsible and sustainable use of resources.
about_story_5: If you want to know more or contact us, you can write to us at:
about_story_6: Thank you for using Bonne Graine and helping spread small seeds… that grow into big ideas.
account_delete_warning_1: This action is final. Deleting your account will lead to:
account_delete_warning_2: • Deletion of all your personal information (profile, contact details, etc.).
account_delete_warning_3: • Deletion of all your posted listings.
account_delete_warning_4: • Deletion of your favorites, messages, and reviews associated with your account.
account_delete_warning_5: This operation is irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue?
purchase_success_message: Your order has been successfully confirmed. You can track its status in the "My transactions" section of your profile.
payment_cancelled_message: The payment could not be completed.
edit_profile_change_photo_alert_message: Profile photo editing will be available soon.
repost_request_title: Unfair report? Request your ad to be restored.
repost_request_explanation: Briefly explain why you believe this ad was removed unfairly or by mistake.
repost_request_success_message: Your request to restore this ad has been sent to our moderation team. You will be notified as soon as a decision has been made.
sell_success_message: Your listing has been successfully created. It is now visible in the "My seeds" section.
